h2_title: Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: He can also pull his familiar trick of turning into mist and then reappearing with a diving bodyslam (now on fire). If you see his black wind fly up, be ready for the attack and either dodge past him or Cloud Step away and retaliate as he struggles to rise.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Bear_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Black Bear Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Black Bear Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
He can also pull his familiar trick of turning into mist and then reappearing with a diving bodyslam (now on fire). If you see his black wind fly up, be ready for the attack and either dodge past him or Cloud Step away and retaliate as he struggles to rise.
